plugin.name: ðŸ“š Readwise Unofficial
plugin.lastUpdateInfo: Fix not downloading all highlights for large libraries
plugin.author: aaronpoweruser

plugin.settings.title: Access token
plugin.settings.description: Enter your readwise access token from readwise.io/access_token

plugin.settings.title: Note folder
plugin.settings.description: The folder to store all highlights in

plugin.settings.title: Metadata format
plugin.settings.description: FrontMatter will store the metadata in the front matter of the note. Heading will store the metadata in a heading in the note.

plugin.settings.title: Group by type
plugin.settings.description: Group all highlights in under the readwise folder or having them separated by content type ie readwise/books, readwise/articles.

plugin.settings.title: Group supplemental highlights separately
plugin.settings.description:
** Ignored if group by type is disabled **
Group all highlights together or keep supplemental (readwise generated) highlights seperate.

plugin.settings.title: Add a link to highlight
plugin.settings.description: Include a link to the source of the highlight in the note.

plugin.settings.COMMENT: Enable to force resynching of all highlights
plugin.settings.title: Force sync all highlights
plugin.settings.description: Debug setting to always recreate all highlights

plugin.settings.NOTE: DO NOT CHANGE THE FOLLOWING SETTINGS; ADD YOUR SETTINGS ABOVE ^^^

plugin.settings.title: Log Level
plugin.settings.description:
Set how much logging output will be displayed when executing Readwise Unofficial commands in NotePlan Plugin Console Logs (NotePlan -> Help -> Plugin Console)

 - DEBUG: Show All Logs
 - INFO: Only Show Info, Warnings, and Errors
 - WARN: Only Show Errors or Warnings
 - ERROR: Only Show Errors
 - none: Don't show any logs
